channel.title: Gary and Jennifer Meese on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.description: Recent content in Gary and Jennifer Meese on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce

item.title: Status Update – May 26, 2019
item.description: Serving Deacon, honored graduates including Bruce (graduated kindergarten). Ashley left with Jennifer Meese to sew purses. Taco Bell. Took communion to shut-ins. Great Clips for boys’ haircuts. Lowe’s again, hutch supplies. Picked up Ashley. Finished bunk bed stairs. Late to bed.

item.title: Status Update – April 7, 2019
item.description: Church, Family Sunday. The Meeses took Ashley to Taco Bell, then their house where Jennifer taught Ashley to use a sewing machine, she did awesome, sewed blanket for her dolls but had us save it for when she’s older. Dillan played at Gabe’s all afternoon, boys played outside too.
